description:
Horde Mode for Scrap Mechanic.
Defeat waves of enemies with powerful guns!

Commands:
--[b]HOST ONLY[/b]--
-[b]/start[/b]: starts the waves
-[b]/stop[/b]: stops the waves, use /start to start them again
-[b]/restart[/b]: restart the game from the beginning
-[b]/inv[/b]: toggles creative inventory
-[b]/god[/b]: toggles god mode
-[b]/pvp[/b]: toggles pvp
-[b]/goto[/b]: the game skips to the specified wave

--[b]FOR EVERYONE[/b]--
-[b]/aircontrol[/b]: toggles air control
-[b]/movement[/b]: toggles advanced movement
name: Horde Mode
